data.name: Succubus Girl
data.detailed_description:
üíòCHECK THIS OUT!üíò

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1870310/
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1850270/
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1844230/


About the Game

"That perpetual being does not die, but in the weird eternity even death dies."
-- Abdul Alhazred, 730

‚óÜStory
There was an organization that harbored unknown creatures, hidden away in the corner of the world--
Leo, a promising researcher, joined the renowned Abel Biotechnology Company and was offered a well-paid job on his first day by his beautiful yet cold supervisor.
Unable to resist the temptation of money, Leo met a naive and romantic girl named Gaia in a greenhouse-like laboratory filled with the fragrance of plants.
Gaia's clean and tender skin, innocent smile and cheerful personality almost stole all of Leo's heart.
In the midst of all this day-to-day company--apart from the growing affection and sweet passion--there seemed to be something else buried in the endless darkness of the past‚Ä¶
The vision that appeared repeatedly in dreams‚Äîwhat could it be?
As Leo, could you accept the truth?

‚óÜGameplay Instructions (will open in the future)
A simulation game full of exploration and puzzle elements.
The player takes on the role of Leo, a researcher who took care of the succubus girl in the institute.
You can try to develop a relationship with the innocent girl and feed her with plenty of love ‚ù§.
Or try to solve the mysteries of the facility...
Remember, there are many truths in this world--and they are often cruel and heartbreakingly beautiful.

data.short_description: Researcher Leo was told on his first day at the institute that he needed to look after some mysterious creature--an innocent girl who fed on semen... There seemed to be more to the girl's secret than that, but no one wanted to reveal the maddening truth-
data.supported_languages:
Traditional Chinese, English, Russian, Thai, Simplified Chinese, Korean, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Turkish, Japanese*, Portuguese, Portuguese - Brazil, Spanish - Latin America, Vietnamese
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: WIN7 SP1/WIN8/WIN10/XP
  • Processor: 1.2 GHz
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 512 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: WIN7 SP1/WIN8/WIN10/XP
  • Processor: 1.2 GHz
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

content_descriptors.notes:
This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work . The game contains Nudity or sexual acts , extreme violence, sexual assault , non-consensual sex, incest , drug abuse, self-harm, suicide, , General Mature Content.
All characters are over the age of 20.
